title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Immersive Mathematics Learning Design Based on Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematical concepts and experience with Learning Management System (LMS) utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex mathematical concepts with 85% accuracy using 3D visualization tools in a virtual world-based library.
Learners develop three or more math models applicable to real-world work scenarios through collaborative problem-solving with peers in virtual spaces.
Learners design and execute 100% personalized math learning pathways using digital curation skills in an immersive learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
